about_the_game:
Embark on the Journey to the West, and Listen to What Destiny Plays.


"Black Myth: Wukong Soundtrack Selection" features 67 tracks from the game, available for download in MP3 and FLAC formats.

※ This Soundtrack Selection can be obtained by purchasing "Black Myth: Wukong Digital Deluxe Edition" or "Black Myth: Wukong Deluxe Edition Upgrade".

※ After downloading, find "Black Myth: Wukong Soundtrack Selection" in your Library, and by clicking "Browse Local Files", all tracks can be accessed in your local folder.

※ Due to copyright restrictions, "Celestial Symphony", "It Was You", "Monkey Mind", "The Greatest Yaoguai", and "Where Lies the Path Ahead?" cannot be downloaded. However, they remain accessible in-game through "Music Library" on the Title Screen.
